Gorgoroth: label=Embassy Productions, Malicious, Century Media, Nuclear Blast, Regain, Season of Mist, Forces of Satan

{{disambig-more: '''Gorgoroth''' is a Norwegian black metal band from Bergen, Norway.  The band was founded in 1992 by Infernus. Gorgoroth is one of the many [[J.R.R. Tolkien
Gorgoroth: Tolkien]]-influenced black metal bands, as its name is taken from the ''[[Plateau of Gorgoroth]]'' in [[Mordor]].
